title: WATCH:  Grey seal saved from plastic ring around its neck
description: An animal welfare group in the United Kingdom worked together to save a grey seal who was spotted in a harbor with a Frisbee-type ring stuck around her neck.

title: UNC to offer free tuition to students from families making less than $80,000 a year
description: The University of North Carolina Chapel Hill announced it would offer free tuition and fees to North Carolina students from families making less than $80,000 a year.

title: US soccer star Megan Rapinoe announces she’ll retire after the NWSL season
description: Megan Rapinoe has announced she’ll retire at the end of the National Women’s Soccer League season

title: 6 dead after business jet crashes into field while approaching airport
description: Six people were killed when a business jet traveling from Las Vegas to southern California crashed into a field and became engulfed in flames, authorities said.

title: A Vermont police officer, aged 19, died in a crash with a burglary suspect she was chasing
description: She was killed and two other officers were injured in the crash.

title: Mega Millions jackpot reaches $480 million after no winner in Friday's drawing
description: The Mega Millions jackpot prize reached $480 million after no winner was found in Friday's drawing. The next drawing will be held on Tuesday.

title: Switzerland to become a net importer of cheese this year for the first time
description: The country will import more cheese than it exports this year for the first time

title: Pence, Trump court Iowa voters in hopes of getting early state momentum
description: Former Vice President Mike Pence and former President Donald Trump employ different approaches to winning over Iowa voters.

title: Minnesota officials say error in tax cut bill could cost taxpayers $352 million, but promised a fix
description: Minnesota officials discovered an error in a tax cut bill passed this spring.

title: 4 die in upstate NY house fire as crews respond to woman's desperate call
description: Fire officials are investigating the cause of a fire that killed four people.

title: Authorities search for 'dangerous' inmate who escaped from a jail using sheets
description: Authorities are searching for an inmate described as “very dangerous” who officials say escaped from a jail in northwestern Pennsylvania using bed sheets

title: Ukraine has said Russia may blow up Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant. What if they did?
description: What happens if the Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Power Plant is blown up by Russia? With its six reactors in cold shutdown, much of the danger has been mitigated.

title: Keeping up pressure, China sends warships and fighter jets near Taiwan during Yellen's Beijing visit
description: Taiwan's Defense Ministry says China has sent 13 aircraft and 6 vessels to airspace and waters around Taiwan as of early Saturday

title: Police officers under investigation for alleged sexual misconduct with migrant
description: The migrant was living at the police station after arriving in Chicago, officials said.

title: WATCH:  Sea lion jumps into kayak for fisherman's catch
description: FISH THIEF: A sea lion leaped into a fisherman's kayak in California looking for fish before swimming away with his catch.
